text_blocks.content: Dec-07-07 04:55pm From-Fowler-White Burnett 3057809201 T-266 P.003/004 F-276
I, Jeffrey E. Epstein do hereby re-affirm the Non-Prosecution Agreement and Addendum to same dated October 30, 2007.

additional_notes: The document appears to be a faxed affirmation signed by Jeffrey E. Epstein, affirming a Non-Prosecution Agreement dated October 30, 2007. The document is dated December 1, 2010, and was filed on February 6, 2015. The image quality is clear, with some minor speckling and a vertical black line on the left edge.
